about_the_game:
In Push Forward, you step into the role of a robot navigating through a series of complex, mind-bending tests designed to challenge your puzzle-solving abilities. This engaging tile-based puzzle game invites players to push blocks, jump over gaps, and avoid dangerous obstacles, all while uncovering the mystery behind the tests. Whether you're a fan of block-pushing puzzles or love overcoming tricky laser traps and spike traps, this game has something for every puzzle lover.

Test Your Puzzle-Solving Skills in a Tile-Based Game

As a robot, your mission is simple: push blocks to clear your path, jump over short gaps, and avoid deadly traps in order to complete each level. The game’s tile-based puzzle mechanics provide a unique twist, requiring you to carefully plan your movements to progress through increasingly difficult stages. The block-pushing puzzle system makes each move essential, and one wrong step can set you back.

Overcome Dangerous Obstacles Like Lasers, Pitfalls, and Traps

While pushing blocks may seem easy at first, things aren’t as simple as they seem. Be wary of hidden dangers such as laser traps, spike traps, and pitfalls that can quickly end your progress. These dangerous obstacles add an exciting element of risk and reward to the game, keeping you engaged as you strategize each move. Will you be able to avoid the deadly traps and finish the tests unscathed?

What Are They Testing You For?

As you advance through each level, you can’t help but wonder: What exactly are they testing you for? What is the true purpose behind these tests? The answer remains a mystery throughout the game, adding an extra layer of intrigue to the experience. One thing is clear, though—you have no choice but to push forward and complete the tests, regardless of the unknown forces behind them.

Why You’ll Love Push Forward: A Robot Puzzle Adventure

Push Forward combines classic puzzle mechanics with modern twists, making it the perfect game for fans of tile-based puzzles and action-packed puzzle challenges. The game’s increasing difficulty ensures that it will keep you engaged as you progress through each level, while the mysterious narrative will keep you guessing until the very end. Whether you’re a casual gamer or a puzzle enthusiast, Push Forward offers hours of brain-teasing fun and challenging puzzles that will test your skills.

Are you ready to tackle the tests, avoid the traps, and uncover the secrets behind your mission? Start pushing those blocks, avoid the lasers, and jump into the puzzle adventure today!

  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct X compatible
